description: [Babuk](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0638) has the ability to enumerate files on a targeted system.(Citation: McAfee Babuk February 2021)(Citation: Trend Micro Ransomware February 2021)

external_references.description: Mundo, A. et al. (2021, February). Technical Analysis of Babuk Ransomware. Retrieved August 11, 2021.
Centero, R. et al. (2021, February 5). New in Ransomware: Seth-Locker, Babuk Locker, Maoloa, TeslaCrypt, and CobraLocker. Retrieved August 11, 2021.
